title: TC ELECTRONIC spark XL vst 2.8-2.82 -final OSX 10.3-10.6.8
description:
TC ELECTRONIC spark XLv 2.8-v2.82 -final version released 

Currently running on mac book pro dual Intel (2008) mac os 10.6.8


I have had this excellent audio editing/mastering software working on all my macs. Confirmed working on mac OS's  - 10.3x , 10.4.11, and 10.5.8

Using sound manager and various external firewire interfaces. 
Spark remains a robust software that was discontinued.

This package includes the key PATCH file made suitably to by TC electronic to adapt to 10.4.11 and does continue to work to 10.5.8 ! 
Never tried on 10.6x, and have a feeling it won't work? 
Never tried on INTEL . Only PPC machines.
(I tried installing the program without the patch on 10.6.8 and the program runs fine - don't know why)


Computers confirmed working with already mentioned software OS.
PowerBook PISMO G3-400
Powermac sawtooth G4-400
Powermac DUAL 1ghz MDD
powermac 9600 with Sonnet G4 upgrade

I'm not sure if this works with OS9, if not, the earlier version works fine which is almost as robust. I have earlier versions I can seed if I get requests. 

This does not come with anything but the original package. If you want 1000's of plug ins, there are other resources. BUT this comes with great plugins and in combo with the AU apple plugins, you can do many projects
